newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE--Kern Community College Dist, Calif.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE--Kern Community College Dist, Calif.

text.p: NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN, pursuant to California Government Code Section 53692, that the Board of Trustees of the Kern Community College District, Kern County, California, intends to sell not to exceed $13,000,000 principal amount of Kern Community College District Limited Obligation Bonds (Kern Community College District Assessment District), Series 1996. Bids will be received on at 10:00 a.m., at the offices of Dale Scott &Company, Inc. 400 Montgomery Street, Suite 805, San Francisco, CA94104, telephone (415) 956-1030 or by facsimile at (415) 956-1322, and the sale will be awarded by the Chancellor of the Kern Community College District or his designee on behalf of the Board of Trustees of the Kern Community College District within twenty-six (26) hours after the bid opening is completed. In the event that the Chancellor or his

authorized designee does not award a bid on the date specified above, proposals will be received the following Wednesday at the same time and place specified above and each Wednesday thereafter until such time as a bid is awarded or notice to the contrary is given. Further
information, including copies of the Preliminary Official Statement, Official Notice of Sale and Bid Form, may be obtained from the Financial Advisor at the above address. Dated:August 15, 1996
